summary: Simple mod that makes Ingjard from Dawnguard marriageable
descriptionHtml:
A very simple mod that makes Ingjard from Dawnguard marriageable.

To me, I thought Ingjard was one of the better looking NPCs in the game and I was disappointed when I was not able to marry her. It is possible to use console commands to make her marriageable, but I figure some people do not know about the command or they have difficulty with it and overall it is a pain - hence the reason for this mod.

[font="Arial Black"]Ingjard's Info [/font]
Race: Nord
Gender: Female
Class: Warrior - Specializes in Heavy Armor, One-Handed, Two-Handed, Archery, and Block
Battlefield Role: Tank
Faction: Dawnguard
Morality: 3 (will not commit or support crime)
Location and/or home: Dawnguard Headquarters

[font="Arial Black"]Requirements: [/font]
Skyrim
Dawnguard

[font="Arial Black"]Known issues: [/font]
No major conflicts - will probably conflict with anything that edits Ingjard directly.
Although Ingjard is Dawnguard she will still interact as normal toward the player if he or she is a vampire, unlike the other Dawnguard members. This has NOT been fully tested, so it is possible you may come across a few issues there.

[font="Arial Black"]Future: [/font]
I will most likely not expand this mod any further. I do know that Ingjard will continually say "another victory for the Dawnguard!" when you walk past her. After awhile this can become annoying, so I may edit or remove this line depending on how the public feels.

[font="Arial Black"]Credits: [/font]
Bethesda


[font="Arial Black"]I can take requests! If you wish to see a NPC become a follower or marriageable let me know through comments or message![/font]
author: LethalThreat
